messages.subject: Project kickoff meeting
messages.body:
Hi Bob,

Can we schedule a quick call tomorrow to go over the project kickoff agenda? Let me know what time works for you.

Thanks,
Alice

messages.subject: Re: Project kickoff meeting
messages.body:
Hey Alice,

Sure thing – I’m free at 10AM PST tomorrow. Does that work?

Best,
Bob

messages.subject: Re: Project kickoff meeting
messages.body:
10AM PST works perfectly. I’ll send a calendar invite shortly.

Cheers,
Alice

messages.subject: Quarterly budget review – documents attached
messages.body:
Hi team,

Please find the Q3 budget spreadsheet and the executive summary attached. Let me know if you have any questions before our meeting on Friday.

Thanks,
Carol

messages.subject: Re: Quarterly budget review – documents attached
messages.body:
Thanks Carol. I’ve reviewed the numbers and have a few comments on line 42 – can we discuss that during the call?

Erin

messages.subject: Your weekly tech roundup –  Nov 1-7
messages.body:
Hello,

Here’s what happened in the world of tech this week:

• Rust 2.0 beta released…
• New AI model beats GPT-4 on benchmarks…
• Chrome 129 ships with built-in password manager…

Read more at https://newsletter.com/weekly/2024-11-01

If you’d like to unsubscribe, click here.
